K12vjviddhu:3: evaṃ mayā śrutamekasmin samaye bhagavān vajreṣu viharati sma /
K12vjviddhu:4: sarvaśarīraṃ vajramayamadhiṣṭhāya vajrapāṇiśca buddhānubhāvena vajrasamādhiṃ samāpannaḥ /
K12vjviddhu:5: tato vajrapāṇiḥ [sarva]buddhānubhāvena sarvabuddhādhiṣṭhānaṃ [sarvabodhisattvādhiṣṭhā]nañca mahākrodhasambhūtaṃ vajrasāramabhāṣate sma /
K12vjviddhu:6: acchedyamabhedyaṃ satyaṃ dṛḍhaṃ sthiraṃ sarvatrāpratihataṃ sarvatrāparājitaṃ sarvasattvavidrāvaṇakaraṃ
K12vjviddhu:11: pauṣṭikaṃ sarvasattvānāñca stambhanakaraṃ sarvasattvānāṃ ca mohanakaram imaṃ mantraṃ
K12vjviddhu:16: tadyathā - om truṭa truṭa troṭaya troṭaya sphuṭa sphuṭa sphoṭaya sphoṭaya ghurṇa ghurṇa ghurṇāpaya (Vvdh_162)
K12vjviddhu:17: ghurṇāpaya sarvasattvānāṃ vibodhaya vibodhaya sambodhaya sambodhaya bhrama bhrama
K12vjviddhu:18: saṃbhrāmaya saṃbhrāmaya sarvabhūtāni kuṭa kuṭa saṃkuṭaya saṃkuṭaya sarvaśatrūn ghaṭa
K12vjviddhu:19: ghaṭa saṃdhāṭaya saṃghāṭaya sarvavidyā vajra vajrasphoṭaya vajra vajra kaṭa vajra
K12vjviddhu:20: vajra maṭa vajra vajra matha vajra vajra aṭṭahāsanīlavajrasuvajrāya svāhā /
K12vjviddhu:21: om he fullu nirufullu nigṛhṇa kullu mili cullu kuru kullu vajravijayāya svāhā /
K12vjviddhu:23: om kaṭa kaṭa maṭa maṭa raṭa raṭa moṭana pramoṭanāya svāhā /
K12vjviddhu:24: om cara nicara hara hara sara sara māraya vajravidāraṇāya svāhā /
K12vjviddhu:25: om chinda chinda bhinda bhinda mahākilikīlāya svāhā /
K12vjviddhu:26: om bandha bandha krodha krodha vajrakilikīlāya svāhā /
K12vjviddhu:31: om matisthiravajra śrutisthiravajra pratisthiravajra mahāvajra apratihatavajra amoghavajra aihivajra śīghraṃ vajrāya svāhā /
K12vjviddhu:32: om dhara dhara dhiri dhiri dhuru dhuru sarvavajrakulamāvartāya svāhā /
K12vjviddhu:35: sarvabalamāvartaya mahābale kaṭabale tatale acale maṇḍalamaye ativajra mahābale vegaraṇa ajite jvala jvala tiṭi tiṭi ti(piṃ)
K12vjviddhu:36: ṅgale daha daha tejovati tili tili bandha bandha mahābale vajrāṅkuśajvālāya svāhā /
K12vjviddhu:39: tadyathā - om hara hara vajra matha matha vajra dhuna dhuna vajra daha daha vajra
K12vjviddhu:40: paca paca vajra dhara dhara vajra dhāraya dhāraya vajra dāruṇa dāruṇa vajra chinda
K12vjviddhu:41: chinda vajra bhinda bhinda vajra hūṃ phaṭ /
K12vjviddhu:43: om hulu hulu tiṣṭha tiṣṭha bandha bandha hana hana amṛte hūṃ phaṭ /
K12vjviddhu:58: te ca sarve ca duṣṭātmā upasargā sudāruṇāḥ //
K12vjviddhu:63: ghaṭaṃ tu rajataṃ cāpi śucivastreṇa vāsitam /
K12vjviddhu:65: japedvidāraṇaṃ mantraṃ yaḥ snāyāt pārthivaḥ sadā /
K12vjviddhu:66: evaṃ yaḥ kurute nityaṃ tasya sampadyate śubham //
K12vjviddhu:67: idamavocad bhagavānāttamanāste ca bhikṣavaḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti
